msbt.message: I'm tryin' to get caught up on this here cleaning, so I ain't got time to jaw today. Come back later.
Let me tell you, the longer you live, the more stuff you have. And I've lived a long while!Ah, well! Why don't you come back once I've got this place shipshape, alright?
Confound it all! There ain't no end to this mountain of cardboard!Eh? Oh! Guess I was flapping my gums instead of my arms again. At this rate, I'm never gonna finish!
Why the early visit, kiddo? Sorry, but I'm fixin' to be cleanin' most of today. Can we talk another time?
Hope you ain't waitin' on me I'm gonna be at this for a while yet.
Phew! So many boxes! If that don't put a few years on my back, dunno what will, .
Well, this ain't comin' together like I hoped. Maybe if I put this over there? Consarn it.
At this age, you'd think I'd know a thing or two about decoratin' but you'd be wrong.
Well, ain't that swell! This is starting to come together!
GAH! How long you been standin' there?! Did you hear me just now?Well, this kinda stuff ain't normally in my wheelhouse, but don't you worry, I'll get there!
